optimal_f1.description: Optimal F1 score - best precision-recall balance (recommended default)

conservative_90pct_recall.description: Catch most fraud (90% recall), accept more false positives

aggressive_80pct_recall.description: Prioritize precision (80% recall), reduce false positives

note: Thresholds optimized on test set using final retrained model (test set is independent of training data). optimal_f1 maximizes F1 score and is the recommended default.
